articles.author: Jim VandeHei, Mike Allen
articles.title: Presidency's once-unimaginable power: The new judge and jury - Axios
articles.description: America doesn't have a king. But we're dancing close to king-like power.
articles.content:
Over just eight hours on Inauguration Day, Presidents Trump and Biden forever stretched the immense public and private power of the presidency to once-unimaginable dimensions:
<ul><li>Presidents can… [+4519 chars]

articles.author: David Goldman
articles.title: Trump threatens China: More tariffs are coming on Feb. 1 - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump on Tuesday warned that even more tariffs could be coming as soon as next week: This time China was his target, as Trump threatened to unleash a wave of higher taxes on imports from America’s second-biggest trading partner.
